article_title: Chief Actuary Blows Away Make-Believe Medicare 'Doc Fix'

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: Medicare's Chief Actuary released an analysis of H.R. 2, the so-called Medicare "doc fix" that shows it is worse than the Congressional Budget Office estimated. The argument that this is a real "doc fix" is make-believe.
og.title: Chief Actuary Blows Away Make-Believe Medicare 'Doc Fix'
